org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types

Interface HashValue<H extends HashValue<H>>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    U128, U64

    @Immutable
public interface HashValue<H extends HashValue<H>>
    a hash value that supports bit-wise combinations, mainly to calculate hash values for reconciliation operations.
    Author:
    Andreas Wundsam <andreas.wundsam@bigswitch.com>

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  HashValue.Builder<H>
      a mutator for HashValues.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      H add(H other)
      perform an arithmetic addition of this value and other.
      H and(H other)
      and this value with another value value of the same type
      HashValue.Builder<H> builder()
      create and return a builder
      H inverse() 
      H or(H other)
      or this value with another value value of the same type
      int prefixBits(int numBits)
      return the "numBits" highest-order bits of the hash.
      H subtract(H other)
      arithmetically substract the given 'other' value from this value.
      H xor(H other)
      xor this value with another value value of the same type

    • Method Detail

      • prefixBits

        int prefixBits(int numBits)
        return the "numBits" highest-order bits of the hash.
        Parameters:
        numBits - number of higest-order bits to return [0-32].
        Returns:
        a numberic value of the 0-32 highest-order bits.

      • add

        H add(H other)
        perform an arithmetic addition of this value and other. Wraps around on overflow of the defined word size.
        Parameters:
        other - the other value to add to this
        Returns:
        this + other

      • subtract

        H subtract(H other)
        arithmetically substract the given 'other' value from this value. around on overflow.
        Parameters:
        other - the other value to subtract from this
        Returns:
        this - other

      • inverse

        H inverse()
        Returns:
        the bitwise inverse of this value

      • or

        H or(H other)
        or this value with another value value of the same type
        Parameters:
        other - the other value to bitwise or with this
        Returns:
        this | other

      • and

        H and(H other)
        and this value with another value value of the same type
        Parameters:
        other - the other value to bitwise and with this
        Returns:
        this & other

      • xor

        H xor(H other)
        xor this value with another value value of the same type
        Parameters:
        other - the other value to bitwise xor with this
        Returns:
        this XOR other

      • builder

        HashValue.Builder<H> builder()
        create and return a builder
        Returns:
        builder
